game.name: SHOCK
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In SHOCK, you play as a disabled war veteran, hunted by a cybernetic creature. With only a wheelchair for mobility, use stealth, solve puzzles, and crawl into tight spaces to escape. Survive the horror and uncover the truth behind this nightmare.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In SHOCK, you play as a disabled war veteran, hunted by a cybernetic creature. With only a wheelchair for mobility, use stealth, solve puzzles, and crawl into tight spaces to escape. Survive the horror and uncover the truth behind this nightmare.
